0.1.name: wordpress/post-form-maker
0.1.description: This plugins makes really easy to create a poll or a vote contest. You can make your form quickly and easily with text, radio, select and checkboxes items, and the form wil be automaticly displayed at the bottom of the post you have just chosen.
